channel.title: Please help! max stats fault?!
channel.description:
green:solved red:unsolved!!
well: got another problem, there seems to be a fault in my client.java because, when i set my xp to 1944000000 it gives lvl 200? and combat 96 or somthing like that.
how do i edit my client.java?? [b] set max lvl to 135 in client.java?[/b]
hi, me again.
now i have this problem: i'm using pimpscape as source and i want to set my max stats upt to 135, i did that in my client.java, and it worksn but now the prob..
[b]how much XP is lvl 135? [/b]
thx
